TextData.Name: Farm Failure
TextData.Description: Crops turn to ash, livestock dies, and the poor suffer; but no one can deny that business is booming.

TextData.Name: Dragon Summoning
TextData.Description: Through forbidden knowledge, you call forth ancient wyrms to terrorize the countryside. Fear drives demand for protective equipment.

TextData.Name: Academy Sabotage
TextData.Description: Whisper dark secrets to unstable apprentices, causing magical experiments to go catastrophically wrong.

TextData.Name: Metallurgical Manipulation
TextData.Description: Manipulate the flow of ore, causing shortages of key metals that make weapons and armor. Adventurers will be suprised but thankful for your extensive stock of gear.

TextData.Name: Divine Harvest
TextData.Description: Channel holy energy to bless the fields with abundant harvests. Your divine influence creates prosperity that flows back to your store.

TextData.Name: Minimalist Mindset
TextData.Description: Channel peoples minds towards minimalism, reducing global demand for luxury goods and bending producers to cut price.
